```{r setup, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library("knitr")
source("civic-info.R")
source("propublica.R")
```
This is a report about the political representatives based on the address entered. This report draws upon data from the ProPublica API and the Google Civic Data API.
As an overview, here is a summary of who represents the address given. 
```{r , echo=FALSE}
kable(political_representative())
```

##House of Representatives

